name: HENTAI RESORT - Dream Paradise
description:
HENTAI RESORT - Dream Paradise. Play, relax, and enjoy the best possible vacations you could ever imagine of - Beautiful Anime characters, games, good weather... and secrets! What are you waiting for? The Hentai Vacations awaits you!

Game Features

  • Beautiful Characters: A wide variety of kawaii characters.
  • Anime / Cartoon Aesthetics: Who doesn't love manga and anime?
  • Minigames: Different minigames to play with the guests and the people at the resort.
  • Laidback Gameplay: Chill and relax while you enjoy your stay.
  • Secrets: Yep! Will you find them all?
